Name: Dangerous Lands
About the game: Dangerous Lands is an arena first-person shooter in which the player will have to fight off waves of monster attacks, find weapons and supplies to survive. Searching for various items of a long-dead civilization is always dangerous. This time the monsters have surrounded you and you will have to fight off waves of monsters and zombies. Use all your weapons. Collect ammo and ammunition. It's the only way to survive. Key Features: - A variety of weapons (pistol, multiple submachine guns, shotgun, sniper rifle, knife, samurai sword, knight's shield and sword, grenade, hunting bow); - Supplies spawn randomly; - Good soundtrack.
